tokens.name: TiffyAI
tokens.description: TiffyAI is the smartest token on BNB Chain, powering an AI-driven GameFi ecosystem with treasure mechanics, staking, and milestone-based rewards.

uniqueFeatures.blueKeySystem: Gamified key-claiming with milestone unlocks (3 = Lucky Wheel, 10 = Gold Key)
uniqueFeatures.aiTradingGateway: Access to AI trading unlocks after 10 Gold Keys
uniqueFeatures.treasureClaiming: Claim system with cooldowns and social milestones
uniqueFeatures.referralBoost: Built-in share-to-earn and community growth model
uniqueFeatures.stakingWithNFTBoost: Staking pool linked to blessings, doubled rewards with NFT
